snippet: Prime Minister Vlad Filat’s governing coalition failed a no-confidence motion on Tuesday, shattering an alliance that had put the former Soviet republic on a path toward integration with the European Union.
abstract: Moldovan Prime Min Vlad Filat’s governing coalition falls as Parliament passes no-confidence motion, shattering alliance that had put former Soviet republic on path toward integration with European Union.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vlad Filat’s governing coalition failed a no-confidence motion on Tuesday, shattering an alliance that had put the former Soviet republic on a path toward integration with the European Union.
